a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (21:07): problem is, I can't tell from the spec what the document-conformance criteria are for the case of multiple character-encoding declarations in a document
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:07): looks

a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (21:08): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: basically, if you just add one sentence saying something like "There must be only one character encoding declaration in the document.", then I think that's all we need
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (21:09): or however you want to state it
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): apparently that's not quite accurate
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): there's a comment in the spec:
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): None
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): <li>There can only be one character encoding declaration in the
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): document.</li> <!-- conformance criteria for this one are given in
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): the XML spec, the <meta> section just after defining charset="",
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): and the character encoding pragma section. And actually this
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): statement isn't quite true, since you can have an XML one and an
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): HTML one at the same time if they match. -->
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:10): None

69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:11): what prohibits there being two <meta http-equiv="Content-Type"> headers is "There must not be more than one meta element with any particular state in the document at a time."
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:12): so you can't have multiple <meta charset>s, you can't have multiple "meta http-equiv="Content-Type">s, and you can't have one of each
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:12): but you _can_ have both an XML one and an HTML one, so long as they match
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (21:20): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: but in that case they must say utf-8, right
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:20): right
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:20): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: i've clarified the statements a bit
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:20): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: hopefully it'll help
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (21:20): regenning now
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (21:20): thanks
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (21:21): I appreciate it
